Proptosis and CAS may not', 'decrease > 2 mm/points in the study eye from Screening to be eligible for enrollment.', 'Administer the predose GO-QoL questionnaire.', 'Contact IWRS to obtain randomization number in order for the unmasked pharmacy to', 'receive study drug dosing information.', 'Monitor vital signs prior to and at the end of the infusion.
